text: 8:10 Aisaia 6:9-10; Mak 4:12Ezɨ a me mɨgɨa ghaze, “God fofozim ia ganɨngizɨma, ia God Bizibagh Ativamin Dughiamɨn akar mogomebagh fo. Ezɨ igharaz darazi kɨ akar isɨn zuibara me mɨgei, eghtɨ me zurara ganɨva, egh deragh bizitamɨn ganighan kogham. Egh uaghan zurara oraghɨva, egh me deragh bizitamɨn mɨngarim gɨfoghan kogham.”
